price: 10. Waxay (gaaladu) yidhahdaan: Ma markaan (dhiminno oo noqonno) kuwa ku baabba’a dhulka, miyaa noqon abuur cusub? Mayee’ waxayan rumeysneyn la Kulanka Rabbigood (ee Aakhirada).
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدِۭۚ بَلۡ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū a-idhā ḍalalnā fī al-arḍi a-innā lafī khalqin jadīdin bal hum biliqāi rabbihim kāfirūna
